title: Assessment and Instructional Improvement Program for Enhancing Maker-Based Mathematical Problem-Solving Skills

context.prior_knowledge: Grasp of foundational mathematics concepts (functions, geometry, statistics) and basic workplace competencies
context.additional_context: Focuses on cultivating mathematical application skills through maker activities in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments

learning_goals: Learners can independently perform maker projects that convert real-world job problems into mathematical modeling at least 80% of the time.
Learners can explain problem-solving processes through structured feedback in three or more stages using maker outputs collaboratively produced with peers.
Learners can successfully execute decision-making simulations at least twice based on data collected using smartphone-based tools.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
